title: Know More About Galaxy S6 Tempered Glass Screen Protector (Web Optimizer)
text: By Web Optimizer Oct 26, 2015 Customers now a day are getting more anxious when their handset experiences a sudden occasional fall as compared to what they used to be say a few years ago. Handsets and other mobile devices now a day are more sophisticated and delicate as compared to the earlier sets which were known for its robust and durable nature. Customers more often than not go for trendy looking and elegant devices which have all the state of art functionalities and features inbuilt in it. And more so, all these features are triggered or controlled by the screen, and not via key pads. Users were not so sceptic using key pads as they could be easily replaced and there was not much technical nitty-gritty involved in the same. However, the screens now a day are designed and manufactured using extremely sophisticated capacitors which ensures that it provides a smoothening experience to users. In addition to that, many devices come with motion sensors where in the user need not touch the screen to trigger an event, rather the motion of the hand is taken as an input to the device. Now, given the technical prowess of the device, customers are increasingly opting for protective shields which could protect the screen from the regular hardships and dust, and hence could increase the usable life of the device. The Galaxy S6 screen protector has been launched in the market precisely to cater to this demand. The protector not only ensures that the screen of the device is protected against the daily dust, dirt and sweat that comes with the busy schedule of day to day work, but also ensure that the look and feel, the display and the sensitivity of the device remains intact.The Galaxy S6 Tempered Glass Screen Protector is made up to tempered glass with a hardness of 9H, which makes sure that it absorbs all the vibrations and tremors generated by rough usage of the device, and do not allow any impression of these hardships to affect the screen. The glass used is chemically processed so as to ensure that the display quality and the sensitivity of the device are not compromised. The screen protector promises high definition display and utmost screen sensitivity such that customers could have smoothing experience on using their device. In addition to that, the glass is also resistant to finger prints and therefore, all of this ensures that there is absolutely no wear and tear on the screen, and the screen remains new and fresh.The installation of the device is simple and convenient with the usage of anti-shattered film with silicon coating. This ensures that the adhesion of the accessory with the screen is perfect and there are no bubbles generated. About the Author .
